desc: The PristineHydro™ WATER REVIVAL SYSTEM™ is the only system that produces water that is 100% free of invasive acids, 100% free of undesirable contaminates, has a high-alkaline pH, and an ideal low TDS all verified by a thorough third-party lab chemical analysis.

layout.text: Water Cleanses and Heals Us. Nature's Original Design is The Essence of PristineHydro®.
TODAY'S WATER REQUIRES MORE THAN JUST FILTRATION

Our WATER REVIVAL SYSTEM™ is the only system producing properly mineralized water 100% free of invasive acids, 100% free of undesirable contaminants, a high-alkaline pH, and an ideal low TDS, all verified by a thorough third-party lab chemical analysis.
